entry.title: Bitcoin Testing Project
entry.summary: Arklan, a video game industry QA specialist, expressed his desire to get involved in the QA side of Bitcoin development on the bitcointalk.org forums. He asked for guidance on how he could most effectively help out. In response, Steve reflected on the need for detailed test scripts and plans, stating that selecting the right tools for the job is critical to ensuring the foundation is sound. He suggested using third-party software to gain benefits like better workflow and test case management. However, he acknowledged the challenge of changing processes once they are established and promised not to change anything for the dev team. Steve offered to open up his VPS to demonstrate what he meant by setting up a fake Git project and sorting out interactions.
